data.title: List of Acquisitions by HP
data.meta_description: List of Acquisitions by HP - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. HP has made over 100 acquisitions since 1986 to expand its business. Its largest acquisition was in 2002 when it merged with Compaq for $25 billion, making HP the largest PC maker. More recently, HP has focused on acquiring software companies to boost its software portfolio, with its largest being Mercury Interactive for $4.5 billion in 2006. Most of HP's acquisitions have been US-based companies across various industries including computers, printers, software, and services to strengthen HP's position in key technologies.
